overview:
Mark Hohmann is a software entrepreneur in the SF Bay Area.

Mark currently serves on the Board of Directors for BountyJobs (where he was co-founder and CTO). He carries both marketplace and growth company experience having launched the local marketplace for eBay Motors and co-founding Katmango, a Trinity Ventures funded company. Mark was also general manager of Tonic Systems (acquired by Google). Mark graduated cum laude from Yale University and earned his M.B.A. from Stanford University.
